options.explain:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects.
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects. (Cooldown: 10 sec. Inflicts 21% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec. (This Shock effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Shock Tolerance.)

options.explain:
Attacks generate shock waves.
Attacking enemies after they're hit by the shock waves 5 times Stuns them and decreases their Neutralize gauge -1.5.

Attacking Stunned enemies 3 times increases their Stun duration +3 sec.

Damage Value +782 if an enemy with a destroyed Neutralize gauge exists
options.explainDetail:
Attacks generate shock waves. (Cooldown: 0.5 sec. Inflicts 30% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Damage Value +6252 for 20 sec. per shock wave (Max Stacks: 1)
Attacking enemies after they're hit by the shock waves 5 times Stuns them and decreases their Neutralize gauge -1.5. (Cooldown: 8 sec.)

Attacking Stunned enemies 3 times increases their Stun duration +3 sec. (Cooldown: 5 sec.)

Damage Value +782 if an enemy with a destroyed Neutralize gauge exists
